question: Who wrote the title page of The Book of Mormon?
The abridgment of the record is written to the Jew and Gentile.
The record is written by way of commandment, and also by the spirit of ____ and of revelation.
The record was written and sealed up, and hid up unto the Lord, that they may not be destroyed
Where in the Book of Mormon is the word Lamanites first mentioned?
The word “Jaredites” first appears to in the Title page of the Book of Mormon?
An abridgment is taken from the Book of ____, which is a record of the people of Jared.
The people of Jared were scattered at the time the Lord confounded their language.
At time the Lord confounded the language of the Jaredites, they were trying to build a ____ to get to heaven.
The Lord has done many great things unto the remnant of the House of ____.
The Lord wants to show the remnant House of Israel the many great things that he has done for their fathers.
The Lord wants the House of Israel to know the ____ he has made with them and not be cast-off forever.
The Lord wants to convince Jews and Gentiles that Jesus is the ____.
Jesus is the Christ, the Eternal God, manifesting himself unto all nations.
Mormon states that if there are faults in the record, they are the ____ of Men.
Mormon writes, condemn not the things of God?
Mormon wants us to be found spotless at the _____ seat of Christ
Who translated the title page of the Book of Mormon?
